channel.title: Ajax < Web development | AjaxRain.com
channel.description: With a diverse collection of Ajax examples, javascripts, jQuery plugins, web2 codes and demos from around the web, Ajaxrain gives you the perfect start to web development

item.title: Drag to Share like Mashable using jQuery
item.description: Learn how to replicate the mashable way of drag to share with jQuery and jQuery UI.

item.title: Form Element AJAX Spinner Attachment Using jQuery
item.description: Learn how to attach an AJAX spinner next to a form element using jQuery.

item.title: Dynamically Create Charts Using MooTools MilkChart and Google Analytics
item.description: A mix of PHP (the Analytics class), HTML, and MooTools javascript that will connect to Google Analytics, create a HTML table with the statistics for a given month, and use MooTools MilkChart to colorfully chart them out.

item.title: Fancy FAQs with MooTools Sliders : Version 2
item.description: A method of taking boring FAQs and making them more robust using javascript framework: MooTools.

item.title: jQuery youtube playlist plugin - youtubeplaylist
item.description: With javascript enabled a nice playlist is created, whilst without javasript the user gets a regular list of links to youtube pages.

item.title: milkchart - Graph/Chart library for MooTools
item.description: A simple to use, yet robust library for transforming table data into a chart. This library uses the HTML5 canvas tag and is only supported on browsers other than IE for now.

item.title: nmcDropDown: A Drop-Down Menu Plugin for jQuery
item.description: A quick jQuery plugin for creating drop-down menus.

item.title: jQuery maxImage plugin
item.description: This plugin will resize and scale targeted images to their max width according to the image ratio, the browser size and some simple options.

item.title: Hwy jQuery ListMenu Plugin
item.description: Users hover their mouse over a letter and a columnized list of all of the list items that start with that letter appear in a submenu. Mousing off of the letter or menu closes the submenu. Mousing between letters is very fast and the columns in the submenu are nicely balanced. This is great for product lists, address books, contact lists, lists of hotels, parks and recreation areas, etc.

item.title: Advertisement:
Making A Slick Content Slider
item.description: Learn how to make a slick content slider for a computer shop, with the help of jQuery and the MopSlider plugin.

item.title: Ext JS Designer Preview
item.description: This new version adds many new features to improve your efficiency creating application designs. Once you get accustomed to these features its difficult to live without them.

item.title: jVal - jQuery Form Field Validation Plugin
item.description: jVal is a jQuery form field validation plugin that provides an appealing animated message flyout that does not impede form layout/design while being user-friendly.

item.title: jQuery Highlighter - Easy to use jQuery Plugin
item.description: Highlighter with keyboard navigation, can be customized easily

item.title: Beta version markItUp! Universal markup editor
item.description: markItUp is a JavaScript plugin built on the jQuery library. It allows you to turn any textarea into a markup editor. Html, Textile, Wiki Syntax, Markdown, BBcode or even your own Markup system can be easily implemented.

item.title: jquery gadget plugin
item.description: The jquery.gadget plugin provides a way of combining javascript with a html resource and css, providing a simple, scoped lifecycle and a standardised approach to writing modular, self contained ajax gadgets.

item.title: jQuery Browser Plugin
item.description: A jQuery plugin extending browser detection capabilities.

item.title: jTimepicker Yet another jQuery time picker plugin
item.description: jTimepicker is a jQuery plugin for set hours and minutes individually with jQuery UI Slider.

item.title: jQuery Fixed Table Header Plugin
item.description: Fixed Table Header is fixing header row of table without div overflow. It is fix header row of table when scroll down the page. You can use fixedtableheader plugin with ASP.NET DataGrid or GridView.

item.title: SuperBoxSelect - Facebook style combo box component with EXT JS
item.description: SuperBoxSelect is an extension of the ComboBox component which displays selected items as labelled boxes within the form field. As seen on facebook, hotmail and other sites, it combines both auto-complete and multi-selection capabilities.

item.title: Spellify - An Automatic Text Field Spell Checker
item.description: Powered by the Google spell checker. This tool will come in handy for your projects.

item.title: inFrame: Keep Demos Inside the Page with jQuery
item.description: Using inFrame the reader does not have to go away from the blog post to view demo files

item.title: Sproing - Make An Elastic Thumbnail Menu
item.description: Magnifies menu items when they are hovered over. Menu items expand upwards. View the demo to see it in action.

item.title: Jumpstarting Your Next jQuery Plugin with an Online Tool
item.description: The following screencast focuses on how to quickly make a jQuery plugin.

item.title: 10 Awful IE Bugs and Fixes
item.description: 10 common Internet Explorer bugs and solutions.

item.title: Creating a Facebook-like Registration Form with jQuery
item.description: Facebook is a showcase of great UI design. Learn how to create a facebook style sign up form with jQuery.

item.title: iPhone Click Effect Using MooTools or jQuery
item.description: Safari provides a darkened background effect when you click a link. It is the most subtle of details but just enforces than an action is taking place. Learn how to do so using MooTools or jQuery.

item.title: An AJAX Based Shopping Cart with PHP, CSS & jQuery
item.description: Create an AJAX-driven shopping cart. All the products are going to be stored in a MySQL database, with PHP showing and processing the data. jQuery will drive the AJAX-es on the page, and with the help of the simpletip plugin will add to an interactive check out process.

item.title: Advertisement:
Microsoft Expression Web SuperPreview for Windows Internet Explorer
item.description: Expression Web SuperPreview for Internet Explorer is a visual debugging tool that makes it easier to migrate your web sites from Internet Explorer 6 to Internet Explorer 7 or 8.

item.title: Symfony Components - standalone and reusable PHP classes.
item.description: The Symfony Components are standalone and reusable PHP classes. With no pre-requisite, except for PHP, you can install them today, and start using them right away.

item.title: iPhone-like Sliding Headers with jQuery
item.description: The iPhone has a few unique UI features, one in particular are the static headings when you are scrolling through a list, so you know the context of the content. Learn how to create this effect using jQuery.

item.title: MTMultiSelect - A paginated, filterable multi-select widget for MooTools
item.description: Its a easy-to-use, paginated, filterable multi-select widget built on MooTools.

item.title: Create a Realistic Hover Effect With jQuery
item.description: Create a Realistic Hover Effect With jQuery, two different effects available shadow and reflection. Looks stunning. Check out the demo.

item.title: Custom 404 with jQuery and jQuery UI
item.description: Create a custom 404 page with some jQuery UI Animations.

item.title: jQuery Thumbnail with Zooming Image and Fading Caption Tutorial
item.description: Learn how to build thumbnail gallery with zooming effect and fadein and fadeout caption. This tutorial will walk you through the concept behind it and how to code it.

item.title: Create a Stunning Sliding Door Effect with jQuery
item.description: Learn how to make a stunning four corners sliding effect easily with jQuery. It's elegant, unique and really cool solution for thumbnail gallery. This tutorial includes detailed explanation that will guide you through the whole process.

item.title: Delectable-A jQuery Plugin
item.description: Delectable is a jQuery plugin designed to integrate delicious into any web site or project. You can display any users latest delicious links quickly and easily. This plugin also has an advanced feature, which enables you to display and browse through tags. as well as displaying the date using the delicious API. Ideal if you want to share your bookmarks on the internet.

item.title: jQuery Moving Tab and Sliding Content Tutorial
item.description: Learn how to build a lava lamp tab and sliding content all together with just simple jQuery code. This script is good for sidebar that display recent posts, comments and community news.

item.title: Page Peel Effect Using MooTools
item.description: The idea is that you place a peel image on the upper-right side of an element which, when hovered, peels open and peels close.

item.title: Advertisement:
jQuery UI Multiselect - Another attempt of a sortable, searchable multiple select widget
item.description: It works in an unobtrusive fashion, by just turning html multiple select inputs into a sexier equivalent. There's no extra markup needed.

item.title: Animate Image Filling Up Using jQuery
item.description: Creative way to animate image filling up. The Live Demo shows two possible animation sequences.

item.title: Vanadium - Simple, intuitive yet powerful client side validation.
item.description: No need for coding, easily extendable and customizable. Supports ajax and regular server side response results.

item.title: Color Changing Text and Backgrounds with jQuery
item.description: Quick and easy way to cycle between multiple colors smoothly.

item.title: Crafting an Animated Postcard With jQuery
item.description: Learn the basics of setting up a continuous animation which can be applied pretty much anywhere.

item.title: Lights Out - Dimming/Covering Background Content with jQuery
item.description: By the end of this tutorial you will be able to add pop up message boxes complete with dimmed background to your existing site.

item.title: DataDrop - Drag Grid Data in From a Spreadsheet with ExtJS
item.description: This plugin is to be used on an ExtJS grid, giving that grid the ability to accept data dragged from spreadsheet programs such as Excel and OpenOffice Calc right into the grid to create rows of data.

item.title: The Polaroid Photo Viewer-Non-Full Screen
item.description: The non-full screen version of the popular Polaroid Photo Viewer with CSS3 and jQuery.

item.title: jQuery Code Expander
item.description: It does exactly what you think it does - Expand any code you want to place online using jQuery.

item.title: Pretty checkboxes with jQuery
item.description: Make your checkboxes pretty using some CSS and jQuery.

item.title: IxEdit - JavaScript based interaction design tool
item.description: IxEdit is a JavaScript-based interaction design tool for the web. With IxEdit, designers can practice DOM-scripting without coding to change, add, move, or transform elements dynamically on your web pages. Especially, IxEdit must be useful to try various interactions rapidly in the prototyping phase of your web application.

item.title: FireCrystal - Firefox extension for designers and programmers
item.description: FireCrystal is a Firefox extension that helps designers and programmers alike figure out how interactive behaviors on the web work. FireCrystal allows users to rewind their interactions with web pages while showing the relevant code.

item.title: Caching AJAX Results in Javascript
item.description: AJAX is an awesome tool. AJAX requests are usually faster than regular page loads and allow for a wealth of dynamism within a page. Unfortunately many people do not properly cache request information when they can. Learn how you can cache AJAX requests.

item.title: Using Opacity to Show Focus with jQuery
item.description: Make use of jQuery javascript and opacity to show focus on a specified element.

item.title: MooTools ScrollSpy
item.description: MooTools ScrollSpy is a unique but simple MooTools plugin that listens to page scrolling and fires events based on where the user has scrolled to in the page.

item.title: Advertisement:
Image Manipulation with PHP and the GD Library
item.description: Systematically execute basic image manipulations without the need for Photoshop.

item.title: Creating a Draggable Sitemap with Jquery
item.description: Build a drag-and-drop sortable sitemap with the jQuery library.

item.title: Twit - Display Twitter Tweets on a Blog or Website
item.description: Twit is a jQuery Plugin to Display Twitter Tweets on a Blog or website.

item.title: Build an Elastic Textarea with Ext JS
item.description: Create facebook like elastic textarea that automatically expand or shrink depending on how much text the user inputs using EXT JS.

item.title: Contactable - jQuery Plugin
item.description: Contactable is a jQuery plugin designed to make contact/feedback forms simpler and more accessible. This plugin will enable you to create a contact form on any page of a site with minimal effort.

item.title: Follow Ajax Rain updates on iPhone
item.description: The all new AjaxRain iphone app is available at the iphone appstore for instant download.

item.title: Smart Hover Box for Mootools
item.description: Create a hover box out of any html element with this mooTools Plugin.

item.title: Facebook Style Alert Confirm Box with jQuery and CSS
item.description: Facebook Style Alert Confirm Box with jquery plug-in jquery.alert.js.

item.title: GoodCorner - Rounded Corners with Mootools
item.description: GoodCorners is a tiny Mootools plugin that can apply the CSS3 border radius to elements using a unified syntax so you can have beautiful rounded corners.

item.title: JQuery Modal Dialog Plugin
item.description: This is a yet another modal dialog JQuery plugin with lightbox effects. Check out the demo, it is pretty cool.

item.title: InputMask Class for MooTools
item.description: The script itself is quite simple. It watches what you type into an input field and matches the typed character against a set of rules.

item.title: Simple Twitter App with jQuery Templates and JSONP
item.description: Twitter hosts this cool jsonp interface that enables you to pull down all kinds of twitter data to your client application, jsonp enables us to get around XSS, so the application does not need a serverside component at all.

item.title: How to create Skype like buttons using jQuery
item.description: Learn how to create the animated skype button using jQuery and some simple CSS

item.title: jQuery Inline Field Labels
item.description: Instead of using a label that is next to or above the input element, the label is actually within the input. Then, when the input is focused, the label goes away and you can enter your value into it.

item.title: Kwicks for jQuery - horizontal animated menu
item.description: An awesome horizontal menu for your website using the jQuery framework.

item.title: Wordpress 2.7.1 featured articles plugin with Moo Tools
item.description: Featured articles gives the wordpress blog admin the possibility to display posts in a slick n cool way on the home page.

item.title: SlideItMoo 1.1 - improved image slider
item.description: SlideItMoo is a banner and image slider developed with MooTools 1.2.

item.title: jSquared is a jQuery plugin for UI like in Google Squared
item.description: This plugin allows you to organize advanced search user interface like in Google Squared.

item.title: AnythingSlider jQuery Plugin
item.description: Just what the world needs, another jQuery slider with a lot of cool features.

item.title: Tabify - Tabbed content with ease - jQuery plugin
item.description: This Jquery plugin lets you easily create tabbed content. All you need is an ul-element with some li-elements and a couple of related content-divs.

item.title: Valid8 - An input field validation plugin for Jquery
item.description: Valid8 solves both simple and complex validation scenarios. Everything from a basic required field to regular expressions, ajax requests and arbitrary javascript functions.

item.title: Password Strength - Estimates brute force time jQuery plugin
item.description: This plugin shows the strength of you passwords by telling you how long time it would take to brute force them.

item.title: Super simple javascript accordion jQuery plugin
item.description: This Jquery plugin makes creating accordions pain free. Just create an ul list and call the accordion javascript method and it is all done.

item.title: Airport - Information board text effect jQuery plugin
item.description: Airport is a rather simple text effect plugin for Jquery. It emulates the style of those flickering information boards you sometime find on airports and train stations.

item.title: Elastic - Make your textareas grow Facebook style jQuery plugin
item.description: This Jquery plugin makes your textareas grow and shrink to fit its content. It was inspired by the auto growing textareas on Facebook.

item.title: An iPhone Scrolling Plugin for jQuery
item.description: Replicate the iPhone scrolling experience in your browser with this amazing jQuery plugin.

item.title: Liberator - The Real time Ajax / Comet streaming server
item.description: Liberator is the most performant and fully-featured server currently available for streaming real-time data to web pages. The technology behind many of the world's leading financial trading portals, it is now available FREE for evaluation and non commercial use.

item.title: Incremental Search for Select Boxes - jQuery Plugin
item.description: This plugin modifies ordinary select tags to allow incremental search. Useful for select boxes with a lot of options.

item.title: Truncatable - A jQuery plugin
item.description: Truncatable is a lightweight truncation plugin for jQuery. Designed for users who want to be able to hide and expand text on a page. This plugin is very SEO friendly, and ideal for environments where it is not possible to use PHP.

item.title: Tweetable - A jQuery plugin
item.description: Tweetable is a lightweight jQuery plugin which enables you to display your twitter feed on your site quickly and easily. More than just displaying the feeds you can highlight @replys as well as links being dynamically generated for ease of use.

item.title: jQuery UI selectToUISlider plugin with ARIA Support
item.description: Update to the popular jQuery UI selectToUISlider plugin, now with ARIA support, making the jQuery UI slider widget more accessible to users on assistive devices.

item.title: jQuery Plugin - jQuery.timepickr
item.description: jquery.timepickr was created in a attempt to make the process of inputing time in a form as easy and natural as possible.

item.title: Pikachoose - lightweight Jquery Image Gallery plugin
item.description: Pikachoose is a lightweight Jquery Image Gallery plugin that allows easy presentation of photos with options for slideshows, navigation buttons, and auto play.

item.title: DrasticTools - DataGrid with editing support, tagcloud and google map component
item.description: DrasticTools is a PHP/Javascript/MySQL based open source package with an Ajax-based datagrid with editing support, a configurable tag cloud and a Google mapping component.

item.title: Create a 3D Tag Cloud in jQuery
item.description: Get Creative! Learn how to create 3D Tag clouds with the most popular jQuery library

item.title: Roar - Notifications : MooTools Plugin
item.description: Roar is a notification widget that streamlines incoming messages, such as updates or errors, without distracting the user from their browser experience or breaking their work-flow by displaying obtrusive alerts. Roar is inspired by Growl, the notification system for Mac OS X and is realised with MooTools.

item.title: Picasa Web Album Integrator - jQuery Plugin
item.description: PWI is a jQuery plugin that enables you to integrate your Picasa Web photo albums into your own site/blog without any need for extensive scripting knowledge and without your visitors ever noticing that your photos are hosted by Google

item.title: Comment Preview Using MooTools
item.description: A tutorial on creating very basic comment previewing using MooTools.

item.title: jQuery Link Nudge Plugin
item.description: Creates a tasteful mouseover/mouseout technique called link nudging as a jQuery Plugin.

item.title: Animated Navigation with CSS & jQuery
item.description: A simple and elegant rollover effect using jQuery and CSS

item.title: Easy del.icio.us integration with JSON and Dishy
item.description: Dishy is a JavaScript wrapper for the del.icio.us JSON REST API. All you need to use it is to include it in your document. You then have several methods to use and properties to overwrite at your disposal:

item.title: Cartagen - a framework for dynamic mapping
item.description: Cartegen is a vector-based, client-side framework for rendering maps in native HTML 5. Written in JavaScript, it uses the new Canvas element to load mapping data from various sources, including OpenStreetMap.

item.title: Twitter like Search with jQuery and Ajax
item.description: Learn how to display twitter like search results with jQuery and Ajax. When you click the search button the results will display on the same page.

item.title: jQuery Plugin intoViewport
item.description: Plugin to scoll to a certain DOM-element, but only if this element is not already in the browser's view port. Also scrolls only as far as necessary.

item.title: ImageCaption - a MooTools Plugin for Auto-Captioning Images
item.description: ImageCaption is a MooTools 1.2+ plugin for easily adding figure captions to image elements on a web page. It is very customizable and painless to style.

item.title: jQuery - dropline with current selection
item.description: A dropline menu with the ability to set the current page and have the menu open with this highlighted. If you hover over any of the other menu options then the current trail is removed and the new trail displayed. Once you move the mouse ff the menu then the current seletion will re-appear. This makes minimal use of jQuery to control the display of the droplines and is styled using CSS.

item.title: jQuery Binary Tree Plugin
item.description: This script allows you to, with just one call, rearrange your divs in a binary tree. Lines will even be drawn to link them properly.

item.title: Floating DIV jQuery Plugin
item.description: Create floating menu, floating headers, floating ads with this awesome jQuery plugin.

item.title: jQTransorm - jQuery plugin
item.description: This plugin is a jQuery styling plugin wich allows you to skin form elements.

item.title: iPhone Toggle Switches for Prototype Framework
In-Field Labels jQuery Plugin
item.description: This is a simple plugin that turns properly formatted HTML forms into forms with in-field label support. Labels fade when the field is focussed and disappear when text entry begins. Clearing a field and leaving brings back the label.

item.title: Flext: MooTools Auto-Growing Textrea Plugin
item.description: Grows text areas when needed, Can set a max height to grow to, Can grows parents if they have a fixed height, Ghost text/text overlay for input context and help ,Text input emulation (enter can submit form, instead of new line)

item.title: ElementFilter - Moo Tools Plugin
item.description: ElementFilter, provides a great way for you to allow users to search through the text of any mix of elements. Simply provide a text input box and ElementFilter does the rest of the work.

item.title: TwitterGitter - mooTools Plugin
item.description: TwitterGitter, a MooTools plugin that retrieves a users recent tweets and allows the user to format them however the user would like. TwitterGitter allows the user to choose the number of tweets to retrieve and returns an object containing the data provided by Twitter.

item.title: Easy Slider 1.7 - Numeric Navigation jQuery Slider
item.description: An easySlider update with 2 new features. numeric navigation (as an alternative to next/previous buttons) continuous scroll instead of jumping to the first (or last) slide

item.title: jQuery Image Title Plugin
item.description: An already existing idea and code is turned into an awesome jQuery Plugin.

item.title: jQuery based web-based spreadsheet
item.description: jQuery.sheet gives you all sorts of possibilities when it comes to giving your web application a spreadsheet style interface with MS Excel style calculations.

item.title: Create a Thumbnail Gallery with Slick Heading and Caption Effect with jQuery
item.description: It is an elegant way to put more content in your website, but only display it when the user wants to see it. It keeps your website clean, but in the same time does not compromise your website content.

item.title: NotesForLightBox - jQuery plugin
item.description: NotesForLightBox is a simple, unobtrusive script used to overlay images on the current page. Its a snap to setup and works on all modern browsers.

item.title: A jQuery inline form validation Engine
item.description: When you submit a form, it will look for inputs with predefined class selectors, and validate them accordingly to their type. It also does on the fly validation when you click outside of the input.

item.title: Drag and drop table content with JavaScript
item.description: With few lines of JavaScript, you can drag and drop table content. Content of the HTML table cells can be dragged to the another table cell or another table.

item.title: HashMask - Another Experiment in Password Masking
item.description: HashMask is a jQuery plugin that will produce a unique and non reversible visualization of a users password. The hope being that they would be able to confirm that they entered their password correctly, but no one else would.

item.title: UIZE Javascript Framework
item.description: UIZE is a powerful, open source, object oriented JavaScript framework - supporting widgets, AJAX, DOM, templates, and more.

item.title: jquery week calendar
item.description: The jquery week calendar plugin provides a simple and flexible way of including a weekly calendar in your application. It is built on top of jquery and jquery ui and is inspired by other online weekly calendars such as google calendar.

item.title: jqGrid 3.5 is finally released
item.description: jqGrid is an Ajax-enabled JavaScript control that provides solutions for representing and manipulating tabular data on the web. Since the grid is a client-side solution loading data dynamically through Ajax callbacks, it can be integrated with any server-side technology, including PHP, ASP, Java Servlets, JSP, ColdFusion, and Perl.

item.title: Font effect - jQuery Plugin
item.description: Font effect is a jQuery plugin that add some effect to html text. The available effects are Outline, Shadow, Gradient and Mirror, etc

item.title: iPhone Checkboxes Using MooTools
item.description: A neat plugin that mimics the iphone checkbox interface using MooTools.

item.title: Load Content While Scrolling With jQuery
item.description: We generally have lots of content to present but can not load all of it at once as it may take too long. If you have always loved the dZone s Ajax content loading while scrolling feature, you now have a jQuery plugin to create a similar one!

item.title: Pulling Your Flickr Feed with jQuery
item.description: Learn how to display feeds on your website using jQuery. The demo shows you how to display your flickr feeds using this plugin.

item.title: AD Gallery, gallery plugin for jQuery
item.description: A highly customizable gallery/showcase plugin for jQuery.

item.title: FireQuery - a collection of Firebug enhancements for jQuery
item.description: FireQuery is a Firefox addon integrated with Firebug. jQuery expressions are intelligently presented in Firebug Console and DOM inspector. jQuerify enables you to inject jQuery into any web page

item.title: clearField : jQuery Plugin
item.description: This plugin takes care of your input fields. Often used by opt-in input fields where the default value of the field is something like Your e-mail address. If you click the field the text disappears so that you can type your e-mail address. The plugin

item.title: UITableFilter - jQuery Plugin
item.description: A simple and easy to use jQuery plugin for filtering table rows

item.title: DHTMLX - Lightweight Javascript Calendar/Scheduler
item.description: Lightweight Javascript Calendar/Scheduler with easy configurable server side.

item.title: Jquery Plugin - Feedback
item.description: Feedback is a jQuery plugin that lets you send Feedback messages to a user after any event you choose. You can use it for custom error message handling,

item.title: Sexy Combo - jQuery Plugin
item.description: Sexy Combo is a jQuery plugin that allows you to turn default browser selectboxes into much more attractive and usable comboboxes. The user can choose whether to select option from the dropdown list or just type it.

item.title: jQuery Scrollable Plugin

item.description: This version of the solution is written as a Prototype behaviour and requires the lowpro behaviours plugin, but the code is not terribly complex and could be adapted to most any system.

item.description: Learn how to create an ajax application using the Bit.ly API

item.description: Easy & rapid integration of content, with minimum JavaScript knowledge required.

item.title: Horinaja for proptotype/scriptaculous or jQuery
item.description: Horinaja is a slide-show ready-to-use for scriptaculous/prototype or jQuery.

item.title: Easy Retweet Button
item.description: The script itself is completely standalone (no dependencies) and can be included in any page relatively painlessly. Additionally, since its just HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, its completely themeable and customizable to the style of your site

item.title: Ext GWT 2.0 Released
item.description: Ext GWT 2.0 is packed full of new components and features, expanding on the Ext GWT 1.0 feature set. Most notably, Ext GWT has closed the feature gap that once existed between its sister project Ext JS. Developers looking to use Ext GWT can now rest easy

item.description: Leverage the power of Ext by creating and dissecting a useful star rating example.

item.title: Reinventing a Drop Down with CSS and jQuery
item.description: Replace the standard dropdown in html that cannot be styled and can only contain plain text with this amazing plugin.

item.description: The form wizard plugin is a plugin based on jQuery which can be used to simulate wizard like page flows for forms without having to navigate between different pages.

item.title: Flip - Free jQuery Plugin
item.description: Original idea of flipping boxes through border animations by Nicola Rizzo who created Dojos fx.flip animation.

item.title: Gritter for jQuery (Growl)
item.description: A clean and smart notification bubble/popup that appears in the top right of your desktop Be sure to check out the demo!

item.title: Twitter API: How to create a stream of messages Monitter-like with PHP and jQuery
item.description: This tutorial illustrates a very simple way to work with the Twitter API in order to implement a search in the Twitter public timeline and display search results with an animated stream of messages (tweets) similar to Monitter

item.title: KeyTable - jQuery Table Plugin
item.description: KeyTable is a Javascript library which provides keyboard navigation and event binding for any HTML table. With KeyTable Excel style table navigation can be employed to provide features such as editing of a table without requiring a mouse. As a further

item.title: scripty2 - A flexible Javascript framework
item.description: scripty2 is a powerful, flexible JavaScript framework to help you write your own delicious visual effects and User Interfaces

item.title: jQuery stylish select box
item.description: Stylish Select attempts to replicate the functionality of the browser default select box as closely as possible with support for keyboard navigation, and intelligent positioning.

item.title: Recreating the MobileMe Web Gallery Interface
item.description: The mobileme Web Gallery offers a beautiful interface, but the layout is done entirely with JavaScript. In this tutorial, we will attempt to recreate the Web Gallery interface using only CSS and a small amount of jQuery.

item.title: HOW-TO: Reddit-style Voting With PHP, MySQL And jQuery
item.description: If you are a regular at Reddit, you must have noticed the way people vote there. You can either vote up or vote down. Pretty interesting, huh? This tutorial will show you how to create such a voting system with jQuery, PHP and MySQL.

item.title: PrettyPrint for JavaScript
item.description: It enables you to print out an object of any type in table format for viewing during debugging sessions. In combination with Firebug, prettyPrint will make you the best-equipped JavaScript debugger on earth!

item.title: Get Slick with MooTools Kwicks
item.description: Nothing too fancy and nothing too bright, just some simple effects that show attention to detail and a little bit of fun. Time to use MooTools kwicks to give your website a little kick.

item.title: The JavaScript InfoVis Toolkit
item.description: The JavaScript InfoVis Toolkit provides tools for creating Interactive Data Visualizations for the Web.

item.title: jquery.fieldtag.js - watermarks for inputfields
item.description: Did you ever see some input fields that have a description tag in it and as soon as you click into them, in order to write something, the description disappears? Thats exactly what this jQuery plugin does for you.

item.title: Multi-Select Transfers Using MooTools
item.description: Move items between two select box with Moo Tools. Easy to integrate with your existing implementation.

item.title: Gmail and Facebook Style jQuery Chat
item.description: everyone loves the gmail and facebook inline chat modules. This jQuery chat module enables you to seamlessly integrate Gmail/Facebook style chat into your existing website.

item.title: pirobox - jQuery lightbox
item.description: Built completely on the jQuery library. Automatically resizes images based on browser window size. Previous/Next links can be outside the lightbox. Stylish loading graphic Easily customizable

item.title: Ajax Push Engine - Real time data streaming
item.description: APE is an open source technology allowing to exchange data between thousands of users through a web browser, without reloading.

item.title: JabberWerx AJAX Library
item.description: The JabberWerx AJAX Library provides a suite of JavaScript libraries and user interface (UI) components which allow a developer to add AJAX driven Extensible Messaging and Presence Protocol (XMPP) functionality to web pages and applications.

item.title: Dajax - Ajax library for django
item.description: Dajax is an easy to use ajax library for django inspired in xajax.

item.title: Table Gear - Moo Tools Plugin
item.description: TableGear is a software package for working with data on the web. It is designed get your data into a web page, and let you work with it quickly and easily, the way you would in powerful desktop applications like Excel.

item.title: jQuery Address - Deep linking plugin
item.description: The Address plugin provides powerful deep linking capabilities and allows the creation of unique virtual addresses that can point to a website section or an application state. It enables a number of important capabilities.

item.title: jQuery Plugin: Tokenizing Autocomplete Text Entry
item.description: This is a jQuery plugin to allow users to select multiple items from a predefined list, using autocompletion as they type to find each item. You may have seen a similar type of text entry when filling in the recipients field sending messages on facebook.

item.title: SoundManager 2 makes it easier to play sounds using Javascript
item.description: By wrapping and extending Flash 8 sound API, SoundManager 2 brings solid audio functionality to Javascript.

item.title: FullCalendar - Full-sized Calendar jQuery Plugin
item.description: FullCalendar is a jQuery plugin that provides a full-sized, drag & drop calendar like the one below. It uses AJAX to fetch events on-the-fly for each month and is easily configured to use your own feed format (an extension is provided for Google Calendar)

item.title: Ajax Tooltip with JQuery
item.description: The information is requested via AJAX, so you do not have to include all of this extra information in a hidden div. This keeps your markup smaller for grids with tons of names in it.

item.title: ColdExt - A ColdFusion tag library for EXT JS
item.description: ColdExt is a ColdFusion tag library which makes it easier to build rich user interfaces using the amazing Ext JS library (currently version 2.2.1).

item.title: jsPDF generates PDF documents using pure JavaScript
item.description: jsPDF generates PDF documents using nothing but Javascript. You can use it in a Firefox extension, in Server Side Javascript and with Data URIs in some browsers.

item.title: Firediff - Firebug extension that tracks changes to a pages DOM and CSS
item.description: Firediff implements a change monitor that records all of the changes made by firebug and the application itself to CSS and the DOM. This provides insight into the functionality of the application as well as provide a record of the changes that were requi

item.title: Experience JsonFx.NET today
item.description: Full client-server Ajax support, Built-in JSON serialization, Built-in Client-side templating support, Server components fully .NET 2.0 compatible and Many More!

item.title: Using jQuery Grid With ASP.NET MVC
item.description: A common scenario when building web user interfaces is providing a pageable and sortable grid of data. Even better if it uses AJAX to make it more responsive and snazzy. Since ASP.NET MVC includes jQuery, jQuery plugin is used in this demo.

item.title: Dynamic Drag n Drop With jQuery And PHP
item.description: Drag n drop generally looks hard-to-apply but it is definitely not by using JavaScript frameworks. Here is, how it is done by using jQuery & jQuery UI.

item.title: JavaScript custom dropdown
item.description: Are you tired with your old fashion dropdown? Try this new one. Image combo box. You can add an icon with each option. It works with your existing select element.

item.title: IP Address Geolocation API
item.description: IP Address Geolocation Javascript API using JSON.This demo tell you the current location on Google Maps.

item.title: Growl style notifications
item.description: Notimoo is a Mootools plugin for displaying Growl style notifications to your web visitors.

item.title: jQuery Tabbed Interface
item.description: Nowadays, a lot of websites are using tab based content as a way to save spaces in a webpage. I have seen a lot of wordpress websites using a tabbed interface for its category, posts, comments and random posts content. It's a good space-saver and if used

item.title: Designing Out Of The Box
item.description: This is a creative trend catching on. Its very simple to do but adds an extra element of character and uniqueness to a design. Take a look at how to implement this out of the box technique and a list of creative websites that are using it.

item.title: Dojox Data Chart
item.description: The latest addition in the Dojo 1.3 release is the new dojox.charting class, DataChart. Its primary purpose is to make connecting a chart to a Data Store a simple process. There are also other benefits with DataChart: less parameters are needed to create

item.title: jCart - free jQuery/PHP web cart
item.description: jCart is a free Ajax shopping cart that is easy to install and customize. Based on jQuery and PHP, jCart handles visitor input without reloading the page and is fully functional even without javascript.

item.title: gauge.js 1.0
item.description: gauge.js 1.0 allows you to add gauges (with shading and reflection) to your webpages. It uses unobtrusive javascript to keep your code clean. It works in all the major browsers - Mozilla Firefox 1.5+, Opera 9+, Safari and IE6+. On older browsers, it wi

item.title: Animated Image Panel like WII Photo browser
item.description: You can download it at http://www.thesoul75.de/anipan/anipan.zip This snippet mimics the Nintendo Wii Photo Browser. You can use the Mousewheel or the left or right key to zoom in and out

item.title: BySlideMenu - Nice and powerful accordion menu
item.description: BySlideMenu is a plugin for Mootools which allow you to easily create a beautiful accordion menu (sliding menu) on any element you want using images and/or text.

item.title: Lighter.js - Syntax highlighting for MooTools
item.description: Lighter.js is a free syntax highlighting class developed with MooTools. It was created with the MooTools developer in mind and takes advantage of many of the Framework features. Using it can be as simple as adding a single script to your webpage, selectin

item.title: A poll system with PHP and mySQL
item.description: An excellent tutorial to build a Poll System using PHP. There is a nice demo as well.

item.title: Ext Core: Cross-Browser Javascript Library
item.description: Ext Core is a cross-browser JavaScript library for building dynamic web pages. It includes: * High performance, lightweight * Clear, maintainable code * An intuitive, easy to use API * MIT Open Source licensed

item.title: Create an RSS-Enabled, Micro-Blog with Twitter
item.description: By combining Twitter Search, Atom feeds, hash tags and PHP, you can create an RSS enabled, micro blog using Twitter and be up and running in less than 10 minutes.

item.title: Protovis - A graphical toolkit for visualization
item.description: Protovis is a visualization toolkit for JavaScript using the canvas element. It takes a graphical approach to data visualization, composing custom views of data with simple graphical primitives like bars and dots. These primitives are called marks, and ea

item.title: Build a Better Tooltip with jQuery Awesomeness
item.description: A jQuery plugin that will replace the typical browser tooltip with something a little flashier.

item.title: Sliding Login Panel with jQuery 1.3.2
item.description: Extremely useful sliding login panel that can be easily integrated in your web pages. Based on the jQuery JS Framework.

item.title: Create a shoutbox using PHP and AJAX with jQuery
item.description: Learn how to create a dynamic ajax based shoutbox with jQuery from scratch. It will be very interesting to know how to use the ajax function of jQuery and how it can be used to insert and recover data from a MySQL database via PHP in a way asynchronous.

item.title: TaskSpeed - Library Task Test Suite
item.description: Basic task test for frameworks.This is not SlickSpeed, though uses the same framework.

item.title: Building a Tag Cloud Using the Google Web Toolkit
item.description: In case you dont know what Tag Clouds are and what purpose they serve, briefly, a Tag Cloud is a form of visualizing the difference in importance or activeness of some predefined categories based on how large they appear in the cloud.

item.title: A fancy Apple.com-style search suggestion
item.description: This example makes use of several techniques: MySQL for the database, HTML CSS for styling, PHP for retrieving the data and jQuery for the AJAX request.

item.title: MooTools Dropdown Menus With MenuMatic
item.description: MenuMatic is a MooTools 1.2 class that takes a sematic ordered or unordered list of links and turns it into a dynamic drop down menu system. For users without javascript, it falls back on a CSS menu system.

item.title: Sliding Boxes and Captions with jQuery
item.description: All of these sliding box animations work on the same basic idea. There is a div tag .boxgrid in this css that essentially acts as a window where two other items of your choosing peek through.

item.title: uploadify - A file upload plugin for jQuery
item.description: This plugin allows you to change any element with an ID on your page into a single or multiple file upload tool. The plugin uses a mix of JQuery, Flash, and a backend upload script of your choice to send files from your local computer to your website ser
